body:
Hi all,

I'm using the original test script for PHP.

All I've done is change my number, and password (IMEI) in variables:

$sender
$imei

However, it looks like I am able to login (see below), but am unable to send any message whatsoever. I'm simply getting the output displayed below.

Now, from what I read, everyone else can get this script to work fine.

Have I done something wrong, perhaps someone could offer some advice?

Thanks in advance, 


------------------------------
```
whatsapp# php test.php -s XXXVALIDNUMBERXXXXX  moocows moocows!

[] Logging in as 'XXX' (XXXXXXXXXXX)

tx  <stream:features>
tx    <receipt_acks></receipt_acks>
tx  </stream:features>

tx  <auth xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl" mechanism="DIGEST-MD5-1"></auth>

tx  <response xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-sasl">dXNlcm5hbWU9IjQ0Nzg1MDY1ODQ1NCIscmVhbG09InMud2hhdHNhcHAubmV0Iixub25jZT0iIixjbm9uY2U9ImI1NGFlNmNkLWU3YzgtNDYyYS1iZjYyLTRmYzg2OWVmMWM2ZCIsbmM9MDAwMDAwMDEscW9wPWF1dGgsZGlnZXN0LXVyaT0ieG1wcC9zLndoYXRzYXBwLm5ldCIscmVzcG9uc2U9NjUwMjZmM2ViZDU5ZGM2ZDZkYTA4ZDNhN2JkYzAzYWEsY2hhcnNldD11dGYtOA==</response>

[] Request last seen XXXXXXX:
[] Send message to XXXXXXX: moocows moocows!

tx  <message to="XXXXXXX@s.whatsapp.net" type="chat" id="1349093759-1">
tx    <x xmlns="jabber:x:event">
tx      <server></server>
tx    </x>
tx    <body>moocows moocows! </body>
tx  </message>
```



Note: last seen is not giving any response either by the looks of things.

Also, I'm getting the following PHP warning.

PHP Notice:  Undefined property: WhatsProt::$challengeArray in whatsprot.class.php on line 119
title: Logs in fine, no messages sent. Some responses empty.
